items.title: Publish-time for rows
items.description: Rows can now set a date and time for when the row should be visible on a published page. Before this date and time the row will not render on the published page. In the editor it will render but be visually marked To use: Click the hamburger in the row-menu and select 'Publish date'

items.title: Text suggestions with Labrador AI
items.description: Labrador can now suggest title, subtitle, SEO-title, SEO-description, SoMe-title, SoMe-descriptions and tags for you. These are based on the bodytext you type in an article. Click the magic wand on top of the page to use. You can also have Labrador create a summary for you by adding a factbox and clicking the magic wand and select `Create summary af article`.
